function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Non-contact interaction activities and virtual community spaces may impact the spatial structure of urban communities and the behavioral activities of residents, potentially leading to the neglect of other influencing factors.","Impact":"Failure to consider other factors may result in ineffective community planning and development, leading to potential health and safety risks for residents.","Mitigation":"Conduct comprehensive research and data collection to understand the full impact of non-contact interaction activities on urban community service facilities and incorporate the findings into planning and development strategies.","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis tools, virtual reality simulations, urban planning software.","People":"Residents of urban communities, urban planners, public health officials.","Owner":"Urban planning organizations, research institutions, local government authorities."}]}
